title: Sleep, My Love (1948, USA) Directed by Douglas Sirk, Featuring Claudette Colbert, Robert Cummings, Don Ameche, Raymond Burr

sources.title: Sleep, My Love (1948, USA) Directed by Douglas Sirk, Featuring Claudette Colbert, Robert Cummings, Don Ameche, Raymond Burr
sources.description: Sleep, My Love is a 1948 American film noir directed by Douglas Sirk and starring Claudette Colbert, Robert Cummings, Raymond Burr and Don Ameche. Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sleep,_My_Love Suggested Film Noirs: http://bit.ly/2tLevkl The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. Download complete online British & American classic black & white films from the 1940s & 1950s.
